trans-unit.source: Represents the navigation and manipulation user interface (UI) for controls on a form that are bound to data.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la navigazione e modifica interfaccia utente (UI per i controlli in un form che sono associati a dati).

trans-unit.source: The BindingNavigator control represents a standardized way to navigate and manipulate data on a form.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo BindingNavigator rappresenta un modo standardizzato per esplorare e modificare i dati in un form.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, a BindingNavigator is paired with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> control to move through data records on a form and interact with them.
trans-unit.target: Nella maggior parte dei casi, un controllo BindingNavigator viene abbinato a un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>controllo per spostarsi tra i record dei dati in un form e interagire con essi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: In these cases, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is set to the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource?displayProperty=fullName> component that acts as a data source.
trans-unit.target: In questi casi, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>proprietà è impostata per l'oggetto associato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource?displayProperty=fullName>componente che funge da origine dati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the BindingNavigator control's user interface (UI) is composed of a series of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> buttons, text boxes, and static text elements for most common data-related actions, such as adding data, deleting data, and navigating through data.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, interfaccia utente del controllo BindingNavigator (UI) è costituito da una serie di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>pulsanti, caselle di testo e gli elementi di testo statico per le azioni più comuni correlate ai dati, ad esempio l'aggiunta di dati, l'eliminazione dei dati ed esplorazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Each of these controls can be retrieved or set through an associated member of the BindingNavigator control.
trans-unit.target: Ognuno di questi controlli può essere recuperato o impostato tramite un membro del controllo BindingNavigator associato.

trans-unit.source: Likewise, there is also a one-to-one correspondence to members within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class that programmatically perform the same functionality, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Analogamente, è inoltre disponibile una corrispondenza uno a membri all'interno di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>classe che a livello di codice eseguono la stessa funzionalità, come illustrato nella tabella seguente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: |UI Control|BindingNavigator member|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> member| |----------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |**Move First**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A>| |**Move Previous**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MovePrevious%2A>| |**Current Position**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>| |**Count**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>| |**Move Next**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>| |**Move Last**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A>| |**Add New**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>| |**Delete**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>| Adding a BindingNavigator control to a form and binding it to a data source, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, will automatically establish the relationships in this table.
trans-unit.target: | Controllo dell'interfaccia utente | Membro di BindingNavigator | membro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>| |----------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | **Spostare prima**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A>| | corrente**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>| | **Count**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>| | **Move Next**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>| | **Move Last**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A>| | **Add New**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>| | **Delete**|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>| Aggiunta di un controllo BindingNavigator a un form e associarlo a un'origine dati, ad esempio un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, stabilirà automaticamente le relazioni in questa tabella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MovePrevious%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: You can use one of the following techniques to customize this toolbar: - Create the BindingNavigator with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor, which accepts a Boolean `addStandardItems` parameter, and set this parameter to `false`.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare una delle tecniche seguenti per personalizzare la barra degli strumenti:-creare BindingNavigator con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>costruttore che accetta un valore booleano `addStandardItems` parametro e impostare questo parametro su `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Then add the desired <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Quindi aggiungere l'oggetto desiderato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>oggetti per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A>insieme.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: - If a great deal of customization is desired, or the custom design will be reused, derive a class from BindingNavigator and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method to define additional or alternate standard items.
trans-unit.target: -Se si desidera la personalizzazione sono disponibili numerose o prevede di riutilizzare il progetto personalizzato, derivare una classe da BindingNavigator ed eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>metodo per definire elementi standard aggiuntivi o alternativi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore predefinito imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>proprietà `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor with a parameter value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore è equivalente alla chiamata di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>costruttore con un valore del parametro `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: You can add the standard items by making a separate call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere elementi standard effettuando una chiamata separata a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> class, indicating whether to display the standard navigation user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> (classe), che indica se visualizzare l'interfaccia utente di navigazione standard (UI).

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>proprietà `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> will also be `null`.
trans-unit.target: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> will also be `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to show the standard navigational UI; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per visualizzare l'interfaccia utente per la navigazione standard. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> class and adds this new instance to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> classe e aggiunge questa nuova istanza per il contenitore specificato.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is provided as a convenience, combining the steps of creating a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control and adding it to a parent <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore viene fornito per comodità, combinando i passaggi per la creazione di un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>controllo e aggiungerlo a un elemento padre <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Like the default constructor, it sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property to `null` and does not show the standard user interface.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il costruttore predefinito imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>proprietà `null` e non visualizza l'interfaccia utente standard.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> to add the new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> control to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> per aggiungere il nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> as the data source.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> come origine dati.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `BindingSource` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore utilizza il `BindingSource` parametro per inizializzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: It also adds the standard set of navigational buttons and sets their corresponding properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge il set standard di pulsanti di spostamento inoltre e imposta le proprietà corrispondenti, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> used as a data source.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> utilizzato come origine dati.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that represents the **Add New** button.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> che rappresenta il **Aggiungi nuovo** pulsante.

trans-unit.source: When set, the AddNewItem property generates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler for the **Add New** button.
trans-unit.target: Se è impostata, la proprietà AddNewItem genera il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>gestore eventi per il **Aggiungi nuovo** pulsante.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: This event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> method when the **Add New** button is clicked at run time.
trans-unit.target: Questo gestore eventi chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>metodo quando il **Aggiungi nuovo** pulsante in fase di esecuzione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è `null` se non è stata impostata in precedenza e se si accede prima il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>metodo viene chiamato in modo implicito o esplicito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control will disable the **Add New** button if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is `null` or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>controllo disabiliterà il **Aggiungi nuovo** pulsante se la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>proprietà `null` o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A>proprietà è `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'implementazione predefinita, questa proprietà rappresenta un controllo di tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that represents the **Add New** button for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> che rappresenta il **Aggiungi nuovo** pulsante per la <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the standard set of navigation items to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge il set standard di elementi di navigazione per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The AddStandardItems method adds the standard set of user interface <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> tool strip for basic navigation operations, such as **Move First**, **Move Last**, and **Add New**.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo AddStandardItems aggiunge il set standard di interfaccia utente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>oggetti per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>strumento striscia per le operazioni di navigazione di base, ad esempio **Move First**, **Move Last**, e **Aggiungi nuovo**.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: Override AddStandardItems in derived classes to define additional or alternative tool strip items.
trans-unit.target: Eseguire l'override AddStandardItems nelle classi derivate per definire ulteriori elementi ToolStrip.

trans-unit.source: To ensure optimal design-time support for your derived class, make sure each item has a meaningful value in its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per garantire il supporto in fase di progettazione ottimale per la classe derivata, verificare che ogni elemento ha un valore significativo nella relativa <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: At design time, this will be used to generate a unique name for the corresponding member variable.
trans-unit.target: In fase di progettazione, questo verrà utilizzato per generare un nome univoco per la variabile membro corrispondente.

trans-unit.source: The item's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A> property will then be updated to match the name given to the member variable.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A>proprietà verrà quindi aggiornata in base al nome assegnato alla variabile membro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method does not explicitly remove any previously existing items from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>, but does set new values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questo metodo non rimuove in modo esplicito gli elementi esistenti in precedenza dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>, ma impostare nuovi valori per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.DeleteItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddNewItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveLastItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveFirstItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MovePreviousItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.MoveNextItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Also AddStandardItems does not suspend layout while items are being added.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre AddStandardItems non sospende il layout durante l'aggiunta di elementi.

trans-unit.source: Disables updates to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> controls of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> during the component's initialization.
trans-unit.target: Disabilita gli aggiornamenti per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> dei controlli del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> durante l'inizializzazione del componente.

trans-unit.source: The BeginInit and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A> methods allow the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control to optimize changes to multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: Il BeginInit e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A>metodi consentono di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>controllo per ottimizzare le modifiche a più proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using this pair of methods, you can initialize co-dependent properties or batch set multiple properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzando questa coppia di metodi, è possibile inizializzare le proprietà dipendenti dalla condivisione o di impostare più proprietà in fase di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Call the BeginInit method to signal the control that initialization is starting; call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A> method to signal that initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il metodo BeginInit per segnalare al controllo di che avvio dell'inizializzazione; chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A>metodo per segnalare che l'inizializzazione è stata completata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> component that is the source of data.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> componente che rappresenta l'origine dei dati.

trans-unit.source: The BindingSource property represents the data source that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> navigates through.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà BindingSource rappresenta i dati di origine che di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>Naviga.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: More specifically, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> represents the actual data list.
trans-unit.target: In particolare, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>rappresenta l'elenco di dati effettivi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is the default property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: Questa è la proprietà predefinita per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref> component associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref> associato a questo componente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that displays the total number of items in the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> che visualizza il numero totale di elementi nell'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The CountItem property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di CountItem `null` se non è stata impostata in precedenza e se si accede prima il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>metodo viene chiamato in modo implicito o esplicito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The count of items is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di elementi è possibile accedervi tramite la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>proprietà di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'implementazione predefinita, questa proprietà rappresenta un controllo di tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that displays the total number of items in the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> che visualizza il numero totale di elementi nell'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string used to format the information displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem*> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta una stringa utilizzata per formattare le informazioni visualizzate nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem*>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> control is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> that displays the total number of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>controllo è una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>che visualizza il numero totale di elementi in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CountItemFormat property is the format string used to format the count.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà CountItemFormat è la stringa di formato utilizzata per formattare il numero.

trans-unit.source: For more information about format strings, see the <xref:System.String.Format%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulle stringhe di formato, vedere il <xref:System.String.Format%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.String.Format%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The format <xref:System.String> used to format the item count.
trans-unit.target: Il formato <xref:System.String>utilizzata per formattare il numero di elementi.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is the string "of {0}".
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è la stringa "di {0}".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that is associated with the **Delete** functionality.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> che è associato il **eliminare** funzionalità.

trans-unit.source: When set, this property generates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler for the **Delete** button.
trans-unit.target: Se è impostata, questa proprietà genera il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>gestore eventi per il **eliminare** pulsante.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: This event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A> method when the **Delete** button is clicked at run time.
trans-unit.target: Questo gestore eventi chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>metodo quando il **eliminare** pulsante in fase di esecuzione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è `null` se non è stata impostata in precedenza e se si accede prima il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>metodo viene chiamato in modo implicito o esplicito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control will disable the **Delete** button under the following run-time circumstances: the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property is 0, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowRemove%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>controllo disabiliterà il **eliminare** pulsante nelle circostanze seguenti in fase di esecuzione: il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>proprietà è `null`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>proprietà è 0, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowRemove%2A>proprietà è `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowRemove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'implementazione predefinita, questa proprietà rappresenta un controllo di tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that represents the **Delete** button for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> che rappresenta il **eliminare** pulsante per la <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> e facoltativamente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal metodo pubblico `Dispose` (metodo) e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`richiama il metodo protetto `Dispose(Boolean)` metodo con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>richiama `Dispose` con `disposing` impostato su `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `disposing` parametro è true, questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dagli oggetti gestiti da questo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>riferimenti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiama il `Dispose()` metodo di ciascun oggetto cui viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Enables updates to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> controls of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref> after the component's initialization has concluded.
trans-unit.target: Abilita gli aggiornamenti per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> dei controlli del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref> dopo ha concluso l'inizializzazione del componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit methods allow the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control to optimize changes to multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A>EndInit metodi e consentono di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>controllo per ottimizzare le modifiche a più proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using this pair of methods, you can initialize co-dependent properties or batch set multiple properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzando questa coppia di metodi, è possibile inizializzare le proprietà dipendenti dalla condivisione o di impostare più proprietà in fase di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A> method to signal the control that initialization is starting; call the EndInit method to signal that initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A>metodo per segnalare il controllo di avvio dell'inizializzazione, chiamare il metodo EndInit per segnalare che l'inizializzazione è completa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that is associated with the **Move First** functionality.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> che è associato il **Move First** funzionalità.

trans-unit.source: When set, this property generates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler for the **Move First** button.
trans-unit.target: Se è impostata, questa proprietà genera il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>gestore eventi per il **Move First** pulsante.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: This event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A> method when the **Move First** button is clicked at run time.
trans-unit.target: Questo gestore eventi chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A>metodo quando il **Move First** pulsante in fase di esecuzione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è `null` se non è stata impostata in precedenza e se si accede prima il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>metodo viene chiamato in modo implicito o esplicito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control will disable the **Move First** button under the following run-time circumstances: the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is zero, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> for the related <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>controllo disabiliterà il **Move First** pulsante nelle circostanze seguenti in fase di esecuzione: il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>proprietà è `null`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà è zero, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A>per correlata <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>è `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control will disable the **Move Last** button under the following run-time circumstances: the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> property is `null` or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property is greater than or equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property.

trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>controllo disabiliterà il **Move Next** pulsante nelle circostanze seguenti in fase di esecuzione: la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A>proprietà `null` o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>proprietà è maggiore o uguale al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: In addition to raising the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems> event, the OnRefreshItems method performs the following operations against the state of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: Oltre a generare il corrispondente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems>evento, il metodo OnRefreshItems esegue le operazioni seguenti con lo stato dell'elemento associato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.RefreshItems>

trans-unit.source: - Sets the internal members using the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> state.
trans-unit.target: -Imposta i membri interni utilizzando corrente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>stato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: - Enables or disables user interface (UI) items appropriately for the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> state.
trans-unit.target: -Abilita o disabilita gli elementi dell'interfaccia utente in modo appropriato per l'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>stato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: - Updates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> controls.
trans-unit.target: -Aggiorna il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A>controlli.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.PositionItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.CountItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato un evento richiama il gestore dell'evento tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnRefreshItems method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnRefreshItems consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Questa è la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that displays the current position within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> che visualizza la posizione corrente all'interno di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, the PositionItem property is of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'implementazione predefinita, la proprietà PositionItem è di tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if it was not previously set and it is accessed before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> method is implicitly or explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è `null` se non è stata impostata in precedenza e se si accede prima il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>metodo viene chiamato in modo implicito o esplicito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current position calculated by obtaining the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, and adding 1 to transform the position into a 1-based count.
trans-unit.target: La posizione corrente calcolata ottenendo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>e aggiungendo 1 per trasformare la posizione in un numero in base 1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, this property represents a control of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'implementazione predefinita, questa proprietà rappresenta un controllo di tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that displays the current position.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> che visualizza la posizione corrente.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the state of the navigational user interface (UI) needs to be refreshed to reflect the current state of the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando lo stato dell'interfaccia utente per la navigazione (UI) deve essere aggiornato per riflettere lo stato corrente dei dati sottostanti.

trans-unit.source: The RefreshItems event signals that the navigational UI of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> needs to be updated to reflect the current state of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: L'evento RefreshItems segnala che l'interfaccia utente per la navigazione di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>deve essere aggiornato per riflettere lo stato corrente dell'elemento associato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This is the default event for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo è l'evento predefinito per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the state of the standard items to reflect the current state of the data.
trans-unit.target: Aggiorna lo stato degli elementi standard in modo da riflettere lo stato corrente dei dati.

trans-unit.source: If you have overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A> in a derived class, you should also override RefreshItemsCore to refresh any custom standard items you have added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control.
trans-unit.target: Se è stato eseguito l'override <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>in una classe derivata, di eseguire l'override RefreshItemsCore per aggiornare gli elementi standard personalizzati aggiunti per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.AddStandardItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Causes form validation to occur and returns whether validation was successful.
trans-unit.target: Determina la convalida di form e restituisce se la convalida ha avuto esito positivo.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to confirm focus can shift before performing the click action for an item on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per verificare lo stato attivo è possibile spostare prima di eseguire l'azione di clic per un elemento sul <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if validation was successful and focus can shift to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la convalida ha avuto esito positivo e lo stato attivo possa passare al <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
